mapper.insert: insert into sys_user ( login_name, password, name, status, description, email, phone ) values ( #{loginName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{status}, #{description}, #{email}, #{phone} )
mapper.update: update sys_user set status = -1 where id = #{id}
update sys_user set status = -1 where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select count(1) from sys_user where status != -1

select
from sys_user where status != -1 order by id desc limit #{start},#{length}
